title: AI Powered Interviewing System
descriptionShort: Smart AI-based system to automate interviews and evaluate candidates.

sections.heading: üí° Overview
sections.content: AI Powered Interviewing System is designed to automate and enhance the recruitment process using artificial intelligence. It evaluates both technical knowledge and behavioral traits like confidence and honesty.

sections.heading: ‚öôÔ∏è Key Features
content: Job Posting: Recruiters can post job openings through a simple dashboard.
Candidate Application: Candidates apply and get verified before the interview begins.
Dynamic Interviews: Questions are generated based on job requirements using LLMs.
Semantic Evaluation: Each answer is evaluated using semantic similarity techniques.
Intent Classification: Understands candidate intent for follow-up questions and deeper analysis.
Cheating Detection: Candidate‚Äôs face is monitored to detect suspicious behavior.
Confidence Scoring: Facial expression analysis predicts candidate‚Äôs confidence.
Final Scoring: Generates a combined score of technical knowledge and confidence level.
Smart Shortlisting: Recruiters can shortlist candidates based on this intelligent scoring system.

sections.heading: üõ†Ô∏è Tech Stack
content: Language Model: Meta 3.8B Instruct for dynamic question generation and NLP tasks

title: AI-Copilot For Personalized Learning
descriptionShort: AI assistant to personalize assessments and learning in education.

sections.heading: üí° Overview
sections.content: AI-Copilot is a smart education assistant that personalizes learning for each student. It automates assessment generation, feedback, and adapts to individual learning styles.

sections.heading: üéØ Key Features
content: Student Enrollment: Teach can add students in the course.
Course Material Upload: Teachers can upload course materials in various formats.
Dynamic Assessment: Generates personalized quizzes and questions based on student‚Äôs past performance.
Real-time Feedback: Provides instant evaluation and learning suggestions.
Progress Tracking: Monitors academic progress over time with visual insights.
Adaptive Learning: Adjusts difficulty level based on learning curve and preferences.
Teacher Dashboard: Enables educators to assign, evaluate, and analyze student assessments quickly.
Student Dashboard: Student can see their performance, can get real time feedback based upon performance

sections.heading: üõ†Ô∏è Tech Stack
content: AI/NLP: Transformer-based models for text generation
Knowledge Base: Retrieval Augmented Generation (RAG) for personalized content
Authentication: Django Allauth for secure user management

title: FreshMart - Online Grocery Store
descriptionShort: A modern e-commerce platform for online grocery shopping.

sections.heading: üõí Overview
sections.content: FreshMart is a user-friendly e-commerce grocery platform that brings daily essentials to your doorstep with real-time inventory tracking and delivery system.

sections.heading: üßæ Core Features
content: Product Browsing: Users can explore groceries by category and apply filters.
Cart & Checkout: Simple cart management and secure online payments.
Order Tracking: Track the status of orders from warehouse to doorstep.
Admin Dashboard: Allows management of product listings, users, and orders.
Discounts & Coupons: Custom promotions engine for user retention.

title: Multi-Lingo - Language Learning App
descriptionShort: AI-based app for learning multiple languages interactively.

sections.heading: üåê Overview
sections.content: Multi-Lingo is an AI-powered language learning application that makes learning fun and interactive by offering language deversification for peoples of different background.

sections.heading: üìö App Features
content: Lesson Generator: Custom lessons created based on learner‚Äôs progress.
Speech Practice: AI evaluates pronunciation using speech-to-text analysis.
Progress Dashboard: Visual reports on vocabulary, grammar, and speaking skills.
Multi-language Support: Includes popular languages like Spanish, French, Urdu, and Arabic.

title: AI Powered Mood Tracker Journal
descriptionShort: Smart journaling app that tracks your mood and mental wellness using NLP and emotion AI.

sections.heading: üß† Overview
sections.content: AI Mood Tracker Journal is a mental health-focused app where users can write journal entries, and the system analyzes mood using AI.

sections.heading: üìã Key Features
content: Sentiment Visualization Charts to track your emotion history
Recommends you songs based upon your mood

sections.heading: üõ†Ô∏è Tech Stack
content: LLMs: Meta 3.8B Instruct for mood detection

title: Custom NLU Pipeline
descriptionShort: A custom Natural Language Understanding pipeline for Natural Language Understanding.

sections.heading: üîç Overview
sections.content: This project involves building a complete NLU pipeline from scratch to classify user input and detect intent and entities classification with high accuracy.
